name: Steve Kilgor
description: Hi there I just read your profile and i am very impressed. I recently became a member of this site and i am searching for a friend first of all,my Soul Mate, someone i can grow with and hopefully the love of my life. Here is a little introduction about myself, I am Steve Kilgor by name, I’m a widower, I like, Music, Sports & Reading. I am involved in other activities as-well but lets leave that for our next message.I would like to know more about you.I apologize if this seem too forward, if you don’t mind we can exchange email that way i can send you some more photos,talk comfortably and learn more about you or you can reach me at mtndewsk@hotmail.com. I will be eagerly waiting to read back from you soon Regards Steve
